nodes.text: The Ividal Sector Forces was a defense force that operated in the Ividal sector during the latter years of the Galactic Republic.

During the Clone Wars, following the capture of Ongary IX by the forces of the Confederacy of Independent Systems, the Ividal Sector Forces supplied a number of starfighter squadrons to support the Republic counterattack, the Republic Military's squadrons being committed to a military operation at Uvadala. During the battle, the Ividal unit Foxfire Squadron was deployed to fire burrowing plasma charges to flush out the Separatist forces.
